item.title: Directional Derivative of $\exp$ on $\mathfrak{so}(3)$
item.description: This post is about finding the directional derivative: $$ \left .

item.title: $SO(3)$ Integrals
item.description: This post is about a family of integrals that are important when computing state transition matrices in certain navigation problems as well as some other applications, namely: $$ C_n(v, T) : = \int_0^{T} \int_0^{s_n} \ldots \int_0^{s_2}\exp(s_1 [v]_\times) ds_1 \; ds_2 \;\ldots \; ds_n \qquad \; n \in \{1, 2, \ldots \}.

item.title: $\mathfrak{so}(3)$ Power Series
item.description: This post is about power series of the form: $$ \alpha_0 I + \sum_{n=0}^\infty \alpha_n [v]_\times^n.

item.title: Useful Properties of $\mathfrak{so}(3)$
item.description: This note reviews important properties of what you might call the cross product matrix.
